instructions: Turn your phone to go into landscape mode for a full screen of your camera s view. Make sure the screen rotation setting on your phone is on. Tap and drag inside the zone to move it. Tap and drag any of the 8 points on the sides of the zones to change its shape. To change the color of the Activity Zone, click one of the colored circles on the bottom of your screen. You can pick from four different colors. Tap the pencil at the top of the screen to give your zone a descriptive name . Tap the checkmark to save the zone name. Once you've given the Activity Zone the shape, color and name you want, tap the checkmark to save the zone.

Sign in to your Play Console . Click All applications . Select an app. On the left menu, select Android vitals > ANRs & Crashes . Near the centre of your screen, use the filters to help you find and diagnose issues. Or, select a cluster to get more details about a specific crash or ANR error.
